query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN youtubeLink IS NOT NULL AND youtubeLink != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_youtube, SUM(CASE WHEN meetingLink IS NOT NULL AND meetingLink != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_meeting FROM scheduled_webinars WHERE eventDate < NOW()
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kPX7CjhqdMFT8y.9c22f9f54902 --database 5n7arrGNHjNdoFCMzyGXcY --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN youtubeLink IS NOT NULL AND youtubeLink != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_youtube, SUM(CASE WHEN meetingLink IS NOT NULL AND meetingLink != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_meeting FROM scheduled_webinars WHERE eventDate < NOW()
